docs.lead_paragraph: Scientists are experimenting with a new procedure to reduce high blood pressure in patients who do not respond to medication.

headline.seo: Experimental Surgery Targets Stubbornly High Blood Pressure
headline.main: To Cut Blood Pressure, Nerves Get a Jolt
headline.print_headline: To Cut Blood Pressure, Nerves Get a Jolt

docs.abstract: Doctors are experimenting with a new electrical procedure to treat high blood pressure in patients who are resistant to standard treatments; procedure involves pulses of radio-frequency energy that are delivered to the arteries leading to a patient's kidney.
docs.snippet: Scientists are experimenting with a new procedure to reduce high blood pressure in patients who do not respond to medication.

docs.lead_paragraph: Seeing too much of ourselves in other animals might not be the problem we think it is. Underappreciating our own animal natures may be the greater limitation.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by cardiology Prof Barbara Natterson-Horowitz and author Kathryn Bowers, adapted from their book Zoobiquity: What Animals Can Teach Us About Health and the Science of Healing, highlights the commonalities between humans and other animals; outlines what these commonalities, which they have observed by working with veterinarians, could mean for the treatment of human illnesses.
docs.snippet: Seeing too much of ourselves in other animals might not be the problem we think it is. Underappreciating our own animal natures may be the greater limitation.

byline.original: By BARBARA NATTERSON-HOROWITZ and KATHRYN BOWERS

docs.lead_paragraph: The drug Perjeta is meant to be used with the company’s drug called Herceptin to treat the disease its advanced stages.

headline.seo: Genentech Wins Approval For New Breast Cancer Drug
headline.main: Genentech Wins Approval for New Breast Cancer Drug
headline.print_headline: Genentech Breast Cancer Drug Wins Approval

docs.abstract: Genentech wins federal approval for Perjeta, a new drug to treat advanced breast cancer; company announces that it is expecting manufacturing problems that could lead to a shortage of the drug.
docs.snippet: The drug Perjeta is meant to be used with the company’s drug called Herceptin to treat the disease its advanced stages.
